text:
@MattHancock People who have been shielding "can safely go outside"? Really? That's one helluva claim.

Listen up folks, Hancock's just eliminated the coronavirus SARS-Cov-2 from UK. There's no longer even 0.001% chance of catching it. That's what SAFE means for the shielded people.
